import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card, Button, Modal, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { fetchMovies, getMovieDetails } from '../redux/actions' import MyNavBar from './MyNavBar' import SideBarLeft from './SideBarLeft' import SideBarRight from './SideBarRight' // import MovieModal from './MovieModal' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const MovieDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() console.log(id) const dispatch = useDispatch() const movieDetail = useSelector(state => state.movies.movie_detail) console.log(movieDetail) const IMG_URL = 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original' const movie_URL = 'https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie/' const shortTitle = (title) => { let newTitle = title.split(" ", 2) return newTitle[0] + ' ' + newTitle[1] } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getMovieDetails(id)) }, []) return (
{ (
{ ( {movieDetail.title} ) }
{/*
*/} )} ) } export default MovieDetails
